title: Short Nonfiction Collection Vol. 021
creator: Various
description: LibriVox recording of LibriVox Short Nonfiction Collection Vol. 021 by Various Authors. Read by LibriVox Volunteers A collection of short nonfiction works in the public domain. The selections included in this collection were independently chosen by the readers, and the topics encompass history, war, farming, slavery, education, philosophy, and nature. (summary by J. M. Smallheer) M4B audiobook of complete book For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks; nonfiction; essays; speeches; history; philosophy; farming; war; slavery; education; philosophy, North America; Finland; John Muir; James Madison; John Dewey; Percy Bysshe Shelley; John Hossack; William Somerset Maughm; Triangle Factory Fire; Confederacy;  E. I. duPont de Nemours Co.; dynamite; U. S. Civil War; Massachusetts regiment
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
